item.title: Create SSH Keys for Local Machine and Add it to Github
Install Nvidia Driver on Ubuntu 20.04
item.description: Environment Hardware: Lenovo y9000p 2019 - intel i7-9750H OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS Dual Boot Kernel version: Linux 5.13.0-39-generic GPU model: GTX 1660 Ti 6GB Install Nvidia Drivers through GUI Link to heading choose the right tested driver version via Software & Updates - Additional Drivers; then click apply changes wait for it to download and configure the drivers. After that, a window will prompt out to tell you you need to set up a key for secure boot.

item.title: Multilingual-Mode
item.description: Multilingual-Mode Link to heading Available Languages Configure Languages Translation File Example Available Languages Link to heading This theme supports the following languages: Arabic Bengali Czech German English Spanish Finnish French Hebrew Hindi Hungarian Italian Japanese Malay Dutch Polish Brazilian Portuguese Romanian Russian Swedish Slovak Turkish Simplified Chinese Taiwan Chinese Configure languages Link to heading Go to this Hugo documentation page to configure one or multiple languages for your website.

item.title: Quick Start for Hugo-Coder
item.description: Quick Start Link to heading To start using hugo-coder: Add the repository into your Hugo Project repository as a submodule, git submodule add https://github.com/luizdepra/hugo-coder.git themes/coder. Configure your config.toml. You can use this minimal configuration as a base. The config.toml inside the exampleSite from the exampleSite is also a good reference. Build your site with hugo serve and see the result at http://localhost:1313/. If you just want to test this theme, go to this page.

item.title: CV
item.description: Education Background Link to heading Johns Hopkins UniversityBaltimore, MD, USA     M.S.E. in Robotics, GPA 3.72/4.00Aug. 2021 - Present Huazhong University of Science and TechnologyWuhan, Hubei, China     B.E. in Mechanical Engineering, GPA 3.59/4.00Sept. 2016 - Jun. 2020 Research Experience Link to heading BIGSS Lab, Laboratory for Computational Sensing and Robotics(LCSR), JHU ARCADE Lab, Laboratory for Computational Sensing and Robotics(LCSR), JHU

Bio Link to heading Hello! My name is Jiaming Zhang, you can call me Jeremy. I am a second year master’s student in Robotics at The Johns Hopkins University. Prior joining in Hopkins, I received my Bachelor degree in Mechanical Engineering from Huazhong University of Science and Technology, where I graduated with honors. I was an intern engineer at Narwal Robotics and HUST-Wuxi Research Institute. During my leisure time, I enjoy playing tennis, cooking and reading.
